TopicTitle: Video Wednesdays: Scott Manley Gets You Started

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_nh7q1hqI9Z1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/NEQ0qKa4X2Y" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>Scott Manley’s so dedicated into helping new players get off the ground, that he recorded this video at 4AM after an office party. He flew home safe, of course, otherwise he wouldn’t have recorded this new guide to funds, science and other important topics for new KSP players in Beta Than Ever.</p>

Happy new year

('s resolution; mention something that isn't a video)
He's the only reason I have any idea of what I'm doing in this game.

Another Great Tutorial by The Great Manley!

Edited January 2, 2015 by SquaredSpekz
Manley has long since earned my subscription!
